meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of autism.
meanings.sent1: He flapped his hands autistically when he was excited.
meanings.sent2: She always speaks autistically, with a monotone voice.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced autistically, mimicking human movements.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled autistically through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The child counted his toys autistically, lining them up in perfect rows.

meanings.sent2: Her autistically unique perspective brought a fresh approach to the project.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces fit together autistically, creating a perfect picture.
